So, Zipper's full name is Zipper the Bunny

author: TheWatcherOfMoon 💙 💛
text:
An End Update could be beneficial to the current game of Minecraft, allowing players to explore and expand their imaginations.
If @Mojang or @Minecraft are reading this, please consider updating the End to create a more diverse game. Thank you for reading.

author: TheWatcherOfMoon 💙 💛
text: Minecraft Dungeons could mix with the standard game, bringing things from the Echoing Void story into Minecraft. New biomes, mobs, and structures could really make this monochromatic dimension a bit more lively. This allows for players to expand their imaginations even more.

author: TheWatcherOfMoon 💙 💛
text:
#ACNH economy makes total sense.
A literal 2x3 solid gold table? 24,000 bells
A sword with the TINIEST amount gold? 130,000 bells.

Thanks Timmy and Tommy.

text:
I got an empty can from the #ACNH recycling box at RS. It doesn't show up as a leaf (placeable) item, but as an actual icon of a little bent can.
Does this mean that you can drink from soda cans or something? Still relatively new to the game (only 2 stars) so I'd like to know.
